title: Love vs. Payne
description: Gia Love and Maddox Payne were predestined to be enemies, despite the fact that they had a common bond. What started as a game of Dare between two curious enemies had evolved into a love that would shatter their world.Will they persevere and find everlasting love or will love destroy them both?Take a journey with two star-crossed lovers as they break free from the grip of their dueling families and find love where there should be hatred.
author: Z. Stefani
